typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive({列4} = upper('v0026'),
		{列5} = upper('v0026')) ~> output1
output1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	mapColumn(
		ten_cd = Column_1,
		item_cd = Column_2,
		teisuu = Column_3,
		create_user = {列4},
		update_user = {列5}
	)) ~> sink1
